vsParam:
Ah ho, Ayesha! Your medicines
are very highly spoken of!

Wow, really?
Hee hee... I am so happy.
After all, you worked very hard!
The effects are good and we all like your medicines!

Hehe, you guys look after me here, I must pay back.
And most importantly, I feel happy when making medicines!

That's wonderful! I was worrying that my medicines
may have no effect on people in this world.

And we can get medicines very quickly once we ask
Ayesha, everyone is commending your effectiveness. 
But... you didn't force yourself, did you?

Ah, don't worry! I have mastered this skill,
and most medicines you guys asked for can be done quickly.

Seeing you guys become happy,
I am also happy.
Hehe. You are a worthy pharmacist♪

Ayesha.
I think I have a cold... Can you make me some cold medicines?

Sure, cold medicine, right? I'll send it to you later.
Have a good rest and keep yourself warm.

Ah, please make some unguent for me!
I have a scratch...

Ah, I was here first, don't cut in the line!
Ayesha! Please make me something to ease my eyestrain!

Waah ah ah, be patient!
I'll make all your medicines, okay?

Ayesha, do you have a minute now?
The medicines in the medical room are running out...

Understood! So, I'll make medicines in shortage
according to the list, right?

Okay... I am going to make medicines,
please wait for a while, guys!

Wow...
Can you take up all these commissions?

Hehe, thanks for your concern. But I'll be okay!
I need this, this and...

Ah! Not enough materials,
I have to gather some...

Let's split!
Looks like Ayesha needs a lot of materials!

That's right. Ayesha helped us a lot,
let us help you!

Thank you!
If you insist, I'll need to trouble you guys.

Thanks, guys!
I have to hurry up and make medicines.

Put this in here...
There, cold medicine is done! Great, next we have...

Just by watching Ayesha working,
I can feel her proficiency in synthesizing medicines...

Uh-huh... Um, isn't it strange?
Ayesha, you are blending in an alchemical Cauldron, no!?

Synthesizing medicines with alchemical Cauldron...
Ayesha's synthesis looks exactly the same as alchemy...
So pharmacist is the same as alchemist, right?

Am, am I?
I just started learning alchemy...

Uh-huh... Although everyone says that,
I don't feel like an alchemist...

My grandfather taught me how to make medicines,
and he said he's a pharmacist.

I just learned about this recently.
This medicine-making method is actually alchemy.

Oh, I... I see...
But haven't you made anything else except medicines?

Hmm... Yes, besides medicines,
I also made bread...

Breads are baked instead of synthesized, huh...
No wonder you didn't think yourself as an alchemist.

Yeah... I was shocked when I first heard that
my way of making medicines is actually alchemy.

Hehe. We are shocked because you didn't know
about alchemy.
Exactly. You are so skilled in alchemy!

Who would know that such things happen
in another world... How funny it is, [px]!
